sentences: Duncan Chisholm (born 31 October 1968) is a Scottish fiddle player and composer.
He has released six solo albums as a solo artist.
His studio album, Affric, released in 2012, was longlisted for the Scottish Album of the Year (SAY) Award.
In 2018, he released a sixth studio album, titled Sandwood.
He tours with the Scottish Gaelic singer Julie Fowlis' band.
He is also a founder member of the folk rock group Wolfstone.
Across the City and the World – Donnie Munro (2002)
Live at Perthshire Amber – Julie Fowlis (2011)
MG Alba Scots Trad Music Awards – Album of the Year 2008 – Farrar
Herald Angel – Edinburgh Festival – for multi-media production Kin
Scots Trad Music Awards –  Musician of the Year 2012
Scots Trad Music Awards – Album of the Year 2014 – Live at Celtic Connections
Scots Trad Music Awards – Album of the Year 2018 - 'Sandwood'
